View

Class DominationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • View.DominationView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DominationView
extends javax.swing.JLayeredPane
implements java.util.Observer

    DominationView

    It is a JLayeredPane Domination View with labels have three function (reinforcement, attack, fortification).
    Since:
    2019-03-20
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    youlin_liu, suo_chi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
